formed by more than two casting wheels
formed by a travelling straight surface, e.g. through-like moulds, a belt
formed by a casting wheel and a co-operating shoe

Casting heavy metals with low melting point, i.e. less than 1000 degrees C, e.g. Zn 419 degrees C, Pb 327 degrees C, Sn 232 degrees C
